CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&username=" + $User.Username + "&id=" + Id + "&queryid= [ServiceInvoiceLines]aHxD700000006JtKAI,[ResourceSummary]aHxD700000006K3KAI, [ProjectDetail]aHxD700000006JyKAI" + "&templateid=aI5D70000000wzGKAQ" + "&fp0=1" + "&ac1=Service Invoice Generated" + "&sc0=1" + "&sc1=SalesforceFile" + "&ofn= Service Invoice for" + Name + " - " + TEXT(TODAY()) + "&ac0=1" + "&templategroup=ServiceInvoice" + "&xdo=CIA" + "&xdo2=GenerateInvoice" + "&congaemailtemplateid=aHwD700000033fjKAA" + "&emailtoid=" + Bill_to_Contact__c + "&geo=" + $User.Country + "&qmode=SendEmail"
CustomField.label: Service Project Invoice Document
